title: The Island
description: One playboy billionaire. One gorgeous virgin. One deserted island...The moment I lay eyes on Kendra Baxter, I know she has to be mine.But the daughter of a Navy SEAL doesn't take orders. She’s been taught skills, strength, and integrity. And God, that’s hot.So I do what any powerful billionaire CEO would do — I take her on as my intern and plan my aggressive takeover.Only, fate has other ideas.My perfectly laid out plan of attack is flawed, and our plane crashes on a deserted island.Here, who I am doesn’t matter. Money and social power don’t matter. I’m not a CEO anymore. I’m just a man.Something’s different, I’m different. I still want to claim her, but now I want to protect her too.We are locked in a fight for survival, and maybe more.And I will do anything and everything in my power to protect her and make her mine.
author: Alice Ward
